TEI.2.document_title: A. W. McClain to Stephen F. Austin, 01-30-2010

barker_notes.barker_summary: A. W. McClain to Austin, January 30, 1825. Misunderstandings concerning land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1029-1030

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*A. W. McClain to Austin, January 30, 1825. Misunderstandings concerning land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p* *location_mentioned*Colorado District*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-30-1825">30th January 1825*/date_mentioned* */p**p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Alley*/person_mentioned* informs me that he informed you Previous of my Being in *location_mentioned*town */location_mentioned*that their was but one League of Land in the *location_mentioned*14th League*/location_mentioned* and that is for *person_mentioned*Blienfort*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*McVain*/person_mentioned* it appears to me that I am not to guit any that I make Choice of as I made Coice of two Places By the *location_mentioned*Eagle Lake*/location_mentioned* first you gave to *person_mentioned*Blufort*/person_mentioned* second to *person_mentioned*Coln Boss*/person_mentioned*" asked you for Land in *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1824">June Last*/date_mentioned* you Readyly agreed that to goe and make Choice of a Place and then I was Called on from time to time that I had not time ontill in *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1825">Septr*/date_mentioned* and then I Made Choice of one that noone hade made Choice of I Lost that and it was Entered in your Booke By *person_mentioned*Mr. Williams*/person_mentioned* I have Been Ready for two weeks to go to work on it or some Place Else if you intend Letting me have any Land or not I want to noe I Come to the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* for that purpose after seventeen months in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* I Cant Come on a footing with *person_mentioned*strangers*/person_mentioned* I Can Return from whence I Came *person_mentioned*Mr. Alley */person_mentioned*informs me *person_mentioned*Mr. Cook*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. Osborn*/person_mentioned* has taken a joining of him on the *location_mentioned*west side of Colorado*/location_mentioned* and that theirs a *location_mentioned*vacant Place*/location_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*mouth of skull crick*/location_mentioned* Providing you will Let it Be Run as *person_mentioned*Gabriel Snyders*/person_mentioned* is if you Consent to it you will Please let me no it and oblige yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*A W McClain*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Judge S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*NB *person_mentioned*Coln- Pettus*/person_mentioned* [was] Present when*person_mentioned* Mr Alley*/person_mentioned* said what he did say on the subject*/p*
*/div1*
